system.description:
When you treat someone's wounds, roll +Wisdom.

You can only use this Move on someone who has just been hurt. If they were hurt in a previous scene, it is too late for you to help.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: It doesn't go smoothly. Either they damage another stat of their choice, or you need to @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.ZrHnVfT943zF7FnE]{pay a price}.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value:
They heal 1 damage.

It doesn't go smoothly. Either they damage another stat of their choice, or you need to @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.ZrHnVfT943zF7FnE]{pay a price}.
